bilancio

Class Archive<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bilancio.Archive<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type of the archive
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Archive<E>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Provides an archive for the management of elements of the same type
    Version:
    Author:
    Mirco Romagnoli
    See Also:
    Vector, Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Archive()
      Instantiates an archive of length 10
      Archive(int size)
      Instantiates an archive of the specified length

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(E object)
      Appends the element object.
      E get(int index)
      Returns the object at index
      void remove(E object)
      Removes the first object that equals object (if it's found) and compacts the archive
      void remove(int index)
      Remove the object of index (if between 1 and the archive's length - 1)
      int size()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public E get(int index)
        Returns the object at index
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the object
        Returns:
        Object inside the archive at index

      • add

        public void add(E object)
        Appends the element object. The archive's length is increased by 1
        Parameters:
        object - Object to insert in the archive

      • remove

        public void remove(E object)
        Removes the first object that equals object (if it's found) and compacts the archive
        Parameters:
        object - Object to remove

      • remove

        public void remove(int index)
        Remove the object of index (if between 1 and the archive's length - 1)
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the object to remove

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        Size of the array
